sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './EvJobs.css' const EvJobs = () => { return ( <>

EV Jobs

{/* icons */}

Working at EV Tesla

We believe living and working with an environment where everyday is the strive to solve the most important problem. That’s why to accelerating the world's transition to sustainable energy is the heart of our company. To make this future a reality, we hire the best talent and encourage thems to live out this purpose not only in the office, but outside of the workplace as well!

EV Domain Jobs




















EV News, Policies, Updates, Award

BYD receives US's largest order for electric buses

Envee Wheels Pvt Ltd [Electric Scooter OEM - EV Coaching Partner]

Prof. N Ramakrishnan [Profile of Chairman - Advisory Board of EV Coaching])

FAME-2 Document

Felidae Electric [Electric Bicycle OEM - EV Coaching Partner]

Awards in Electric Vehicle Domain for Academia & Industry

  • EV Event Brochure

    • Electric Vehicle Training & Workshop Academy_EV Courses with Job Assistance & Life Time Membership

  • Download Course Brochure Data

    • Electric Vehicle Training & Workshop Academy_EV Courses with Job Assistance & Life Time Membership

    Diploma in Electric Vehicle for Electric Bicycle Kit Fitment, Electric Scooter Parts Demonstration, E-Rickshaw with Hands on & Job Assistance

    Diploma in Electric Vehicle with Job Assistance

    Diploma in Electric Vehicle Battery Design with Job Assistance

Register for Demo & More Details

) } export default EvJobs
